Name: Shabti of Pai
Description: This lovely wooden shabti belongs to Pai, "Scribe of the Royal Harem and of the Lord of the Two Lands", who lived at the beginning of the 19th Dynasty. It  holds two hoes for carrying out the corvee work in the Afterlife. On the back, the figurine carries a sack and a yoke with two jars. The kilt is entirely covered with texts derived from Chapter 6 of the Book of the Dead.
